pages.text: Dragon Mounts Legacy lets you hatch and ride dragons across the skies! $(br2)Explore the world with your loyal companion and dominate the skies.
To hatch an Aether Dragon, find a Dragon Egg and place it at a height of 170 or above in the Overworld. $(br2)Right-click the egg to hatch it.

To hatch other types of dragons, place the Dragon Egg in specific environments: $(br2)- Magma blocks for Fire Dragon $(br2)- Water for Water Dragon $(br2)- Snow and ice blocks for Ice Dragon $(br2)The environment around the egg determines the dragon type.
Once your dragon hatches, raise it to adulthood by feeding it. $(br2)Craft a Dragon Saddle to ride your dragon and soar through the skies with its powerful wings!

Breeding Dragons: You can breed dragons using specific items unique to each dragon type. For example, breed Fire Dragons with Blaze Powder and Ice Dragons with Packed Ice. The crossbreeding system allows custom addons to define new breeds.
